definition: fat/fertile/loose-fitting or large/to fertilize/to become rich by illegal means/fertilizer/manure

sentences.english: Process for the preparation of fluoboric acid from fluosilicic acid, a byproduct of phosphate was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 闡述了利用磷肥副產氟硅酸製備氟硼酸的新工藝。

sentences.english: The application of phosphate fertilizer in green manure production is the important technique measure for raising its fresh grass yield.
sentences.chinese: 增施磷肥是增加綠肥鮮草產量的一項重要技術措施。

sentences.english: In 2005, the company acquired full Honghu phosphate fertilizer plant.
sentences.chinese: 2005年，公司全額收購了洪湖磷肥廠。

sentences.english: The main material of the phosphate fertilizer is apatite.
sentences.chinese: 這種磷肥的主要原料就是磷灰石。

sentences.english: He applied phosphate fertilizer in nutrient solution at two levels and at three stages of development .
sentences.chinese: 他在營養液中分兩個用量三個發育階段施入磷肥。

sentences.english: Phosphate rock is the major raw material in the production of Phosphate fertilizer.
sentences.chinese: 磷礦是生產磷肥的主要原料。

sentences.english: Effects of phosphate significantly affected fruit yield and number of cladodes .
sentences.chinese: 磷肥施用量對紅龍果果實總產量有顯著影響。

sentences.english: Nevertheless, in some areas, banding of phosphate has continued to be recommended.
sentences.chinese: 儘管如此，在某些情況下，仍推薦磷肥條施。

sentences.english: Therefore, high efficient phosphoric fertilizers had wide prospects of application in Leizhou Peninsula.
sentences.chinese: 因此，高效磷肥在雷州半島地區有廣闊的應用前景。
